dict.string: Which of the following is NOT another way of saying "There is none else besides Him"?
There is only one force in reality
There exists only one force of reception in reality
There exists only a single quality of bestowal
The Creator, or Nature, is all that exists
Why does a person perceive that there are things in the world that deny the Creator's existence? Because ...
This is the mistake the Creator made when creating the person
There really is no Creator
It is the Creator's will that the person attain Him through free choice
The Creator wanted humanity to suffer
How many lines does a person advance spiritually through?
Which of the following is NOT an attribute of the right line?
Greatness of the goal of creation
Importance of bestowal
Valuing the society that aims to reach adhesion with the Creator
Recognition of one's ego as evil
Which of the following is an attribute of the left line?
Greatness of the goal of creation
Importance of bestowal
Valuing the society that aims to reach adhesion with the Creator
Recognition of one's ego as evil
Which of the following is NOT an attribute of the middle line?
Prayer
Overcoming my ego with my own powers
Raising MAN
Demand for the Creator's help
What is the benefit of a person being rejected from attaining the Creator?
The person thus develops a need for the Creator's help
There is no benefit
The person thus gets more fuel to advance with his own powers
The person thus gets to remain longer in this world
How much time should a person advancing spiritually spend on the right line and left line?
50% of one's time on the right line & 50% of one's time on the left line
Always cling to the left line, since the right line is revealed from above
Always cling to the right line, since the left line is revealed from above
80% of one's time on the right line & 20% of one's time on the left line
What means does a person have to cling onto the right line?
Kabbalistic books
A Kabbalistic group
A Rav
All of the above are equally important
Which of the following statements about when the middle line revealed to the person is incorrect?
After 100% of the person's efforts to try bestow & his/her realization that s/he cannot bestow
After the person makes all the efforts s/he can to come close to the Creator & realizes that s/he is at the furthest point away from the Creator
After the person did everything s/he could to cling to the importance of bestowal in the spiritually supportive environment & realizes that s/he cannot do it anymore
After the person made a great effort to bestow and overcame his/her ego with his/her own powers
